channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023120866
item.description:
Report X-2023120866

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: AZTEC
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was brought to the repack area, bucket had a crack on the side. Contents leaked out. DescribePack: one crack on the side of the bucket. about 10 inches DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in a tote and a Hazmat bag. package was placed in the repack area.
